channel.title: Moving shops from one scape to another?
channel.description:
hi i was wondering how to copy the shops and their items (the npc's) from one runescape to another?
i.e pimpscape to another, thanks.

item.description:
@Tical wrote:

ok thanks alot, really appreciate your help

item.title: Moving shops from one scape to another?
item.dc:creator: @udluv2 udluv2
item.description:
@udluv2 wrote:

Open up Shop.CFG and then copy the shop. Then open up the Shop.Cfg of the server u want it to go to and then paste it at the end of the list changing the shop number to the next avaliable number or replace ur old shop with it.

Read full topic
